post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, September 7
post.Content:
I'm posting this weeks links very quickly as I have a lot to get done this week! Enjoy! :-)

  • This week I released updates to ControlsFX and Scenic View to include support for JavaFX 8u60.
  • Sébastien Bordes released JRebirth 8.0.3.
  • Hendrik Ebbers posted about 'Cool JavaFX UIs in less time? Use projection!'.
  • Rob Terp has posted about 'Creating Custom Animated Transitions with JavaFX'.
  • Andres Almiray has posted about 'BootstrapFX, the early days'.
  • Tom Schindl has released e(fx)clipse 2.1.0, which includes a number of nice new features.
  • Otto is working on Musicott, a "JavaFX application that manages and plays music files."
  • Alberto Gil has posted about MaterialFX, another material design CSS project for JavaFX. Looks good!
  • José Robson Mariano Alves has created bgfinancas, an "open source software to control your financial life."

Catch you again next week.
